data.name: ErrorMessage_Category.Text
data.value: Please provide at least 1 category (up to {0} categories) for this product.

data.name: plOrder.Help
data.value: The "Sort Index" is the first factor when display products.The default is 100, means don't set special display order.However, if you have some important products which you want them always display first to public, you can set a lower sort index (e.g.20).

data.name: plImage.Help
data.value: Choose product image file (jpe, jpeg, jpg, bmp, png). You can select video from your files, or add from external url, for example, http://DnnModule.com/portals/0/test.jpg

data.name: plViewRoles.Help
data.value: Select roles which can view this product

data.name: plAllowRating.Help
data.value: Allow visitors to rating product by default, each product can has its own rating settings. Note, if product is sell online, then customers who bought this listing can rating it natively.

data.name: plRatingRoles.Help
data.value: Select roles which can ratings by default, each product can has its own rating roles. Note, if product is sell online, then only customers who bought this product can rating it.

data.name: plPreviousVersion.Help
data.value: When product is a advanced version of existing item, module will display a "new version available" tip in existing item detail. And, you can also move reviews from old version to new version.

data.name: plLinkUrl.Help
data.value: When user click product, it will navigate to this link url. Leave it as blank if you don't want link to external url.

data.name: plActive.Help
data.value: Set product as active. If a product is marked as inactive, it will not display to visitors.

data.name: plWeight.Help
data.value: Product weight which used to calculate shippping fee.

data.name: lblPortalDisableComment.Text
data.value: Comment is disabled by site administrator.

data.name: lblPortalDisableRating.Text
data.value: Rating is disabled by site administrator.

data.name: plDownloadRoles.Help
data.value: Select roles which can download attachments of this product.

data.name: plPopularTag.Help
data.value: Choose popular tags from drop down list box, click "Add Tag" button to add it to product tag list.

data.name: imgDownload.Text
data.value: Edit download files, clients can download them after paid.

data.name: plStockQuantity.Help
data.value: Enter stock quantity, module will reduce this value after ordered. If stock quantity is lower to 0, then user can't buy it anymore.

data.name: plPackageFee.Help
data.value: Additional amount to charge for shipping per item, will be added to the shipping total for the order

data.name: plSku.Help
data.value: SKU=stock keeping uint, this value is optional.

data.name: lblStepSynchronize.Text
data.value: Step 2: Synchronize uploaded files from temporary directory to server.

data.name: lblStepUpload.Text
data.value: Step 1: Module provides two upload methods: MS Silverlight and JavaScript. MS Silverlight plug-in is recommended (if it is available) because it allows you to upload big size files. Click "Select Files" button to select files (you can press Ctrl key to select multiple files once), then click "upload" button to upload files to temporary directory.

data.name: plAudioFile.Help
data.value: Choose audio file (mp3).You can select audio from your files. Or add from external url, for example, http://DnnModule.com/portals/0/test.mp3.

data.name: plAudioTitle.Help
data.value: Enter audio title. It can't be null

data.name: plImageFile.Help
data.value: Choose image file (jpe, jpeg, jpg, bmp, png). You can select image from your files, or add from external url, for example, http://DnnModule.com/portals/0/test.jpg

data.name: plImageTitle.Help
data.value: Enter image title, can't be null

data.name: plVideoFile.Help
data.value: Choose video file (.flv or mp4). You can select video from your files. Or add from external url, for example, http://DnnModule.com/portals/0/test.flv. You can also type youtube url as external source, for example, http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0klgLsSxGsU. Besides that, you can add video from embed code. Nearlly all video sites offer these embed code.

data.name: plVideoTitle.Help
data.value: Enter video title, can't be null

data.name: RegModuleTip.Text
data.value: You are using a unregistered copy of Classified Pro which can add up to 100 product items. Please register at "Cp_Admin sub module - Help - Register" section to remove this limitation. Thanks for your support.

data.name: MyFolder.Help
data.value: You can add related files under selected folder by click "Add From Folder"

data.name: plVideoDuration.Help
data.value: Enter video duration (optional), hh:mm:ss format like 01:20:03. Note, module will automatic detect its duration if it is from local files and video encode feature is enabled in "General settings" of Cp_Admin sub module.

data.name: plVideoThumbnail.Help
data.value: Specify a thumbnail image for video (optional). Note, module will automatic detect its thumbnail if it is from local files and video encode feature is enabled in "General settings" of Cp_Admin sub module.

data.name: lblAddFromFile_Step2.Text
data.value: Step 1: Choose a file from existing files.

data.name: lblAddFromFile_Step3.Text
data.value: Step 2: Click "Add File" button to add it.

data.name: Tip_UploadNewFile.Text
data.value: If you have problem to upload large files (e.g. your zip package is 100mb in size), we recommend you to upload them via ftp tools first, then click "Add from existing files" to add them.

data.name: Error_FileNotExist.Text
data.value: The file you specified doesn't exist, please check it.

data.name: Error_SpecifyZipFile.Text
data.value: Please specify a valid file first.

data.name: lblTagTip.Text
data.value: Enter tags below (one tag per line) or click "Add Tag" to add existing popular tag.

data.name: Tip_ManagePermission.Text
data.value: Note, only site administrators or product manage roles can access this tab. Normal users will use the default permissions which are specified in "Cp_Admin sub module - Admin Control Panel - Configurations - Store Settings".

data.name: Tip_SelectCategory.Text
data.value: Select at least 1 category (up to {0} categories) for current product.

data.name: Tip_Summary.Text
data.value: Enter short description for this product (1000 characters limit) .

data.name: Tip_AudioSource.Text
data.value:
Audio source can come from bellowings:
1. Local File, Mp3 files which you uploaded to site.

2. External Url, like followings
:File in exernal site, e.g http://DnnModule.com/portals/0/test.mp3
:Http stream, e.g http://http://DnnModule.com/Audio.asp?Audioid=3

data.name: Tip_VideoSource.Text
data.value:
Video source can come from bellowings:
1. Local File, Flv/Mp4/Swf video files which you uploaded to site.

2. External Url, like followings
:File in exernal site, e.g. http://DnnModule.com/portals/0/test.flv
:Http stream, e.g. http://http://DnnModule.com/video.asp?videoid=3
:YouTube video url, e.g. http://youtube.com/watch?v=aYlx5gW90Aw

3. Embed Code, embed code from other sites.

data.name: Tip_LinkUrl.Text
data.value: Leave link url as "None" in most cases. If you specify it, module will navigate to that url when visitor click product in Cp_Product_List sub module.

data.name: plBillPeriod.Help
data.value: These two fields are used in conjunction to enter a Billing Period. e.g. 2 weeks, or 1 month

data.name: plRecursiveBill.Help
data.value: Check on "Recursive Billing" and enter "Billing Period" if you want to charge recursive.

data.name: Tip_RecursiveBill.Text
data.value: Check on "Recursive Billing" and enter "Billing Period" if you want to charge recursive.

data.name: Tip_ViewOrder.Text
data.value: The "Sort Index" is the first factor when display products. The default is 10000, means don't set special display order. However, if you have some important products which you want them always display first to public, you can set a lower sort index (e.g. 9000).

data.name: Warning_ExceedQuota.Text
data.value: You have reached your products quota. Before add new product, please contact site administrator to increase your products quota, or delete existing products .

data.name: plMapTitle.Help
data.value: Map title whick display above the red air bubble (which indicate your position). Module will use prouct name instead if you don't specify it.

data.name: imgRepublish.Text
data.value:
Republish this item if it is expired but not sold out (or bidder won it but didn't check out).
Note, if "Automatic Republish" option (locates under "Cp_Admin sub module - Admin contorl panel - Configurations - Store Settings") is checked,
Classified Pro will automatic republish expired auction listings (if they don't get any valid bid).

data.name: RepublishItem.Text
data.value: Republish a auction item will delete all bid history of it, are you sure you want to republish this expired item?

data.name: RepublishItems.Text
data.value: Republish auction items will delete all bid history of them, are you sure you want to republish these auction items?

data.name: li_ShippingFeeType_Default.Text
data.value: Depends on the shipping method which client choose

data.name: plAuctionDays.Help
data.value: Value must lower (or equal to) the maximum auction days of current department. This value can't be changed after product creation.

data.name: plBidIncrement.Help
data.value: Enter the minimum increment for each bidding.

data.name: plBuyNowPrice.Help
data.value: User can directly order your auction product with this price (without the bidding process), Leave it as 0 if you don't allow direct order.

data.name: plFixedShippingFee.Help
data.value: If the "Shipping Fee Type" is "Seller choose the shipping method - fixed shipping fee", specify a fixed shipping fee here.

data.name: plFixedTaxRate.Help
data.value: If the "Tax Rate Type" is "Fixed tax rate", specify a fixed tax rate here. Note, you don't need to provide % symbol.

data.name: plReservePrice.Help
data.value: Enter a reserve price. If the final auction price is lower than this value, the auction will be cancelled. Leave it as 0 if you don't want to limit it.

data.name: plShippingFeeType.Help
data.value: Choose shipping fee type for this listing.

data.name: plStartPrice.Help
data.value: Enter a initial auction price, leave it as 0 if you don't want to limit it.

data.name: plTaxRateType.Help
data.value: Choose tax rate type for this listing.

data.name: Tip_AuctionPrice.Text
data.value:
Please note below auction properties:
1. Start Price, the initial auction start price, value must bigger than 0.
2. Minimum Bidding Increment, the minimum increment for each bidding, value must bigger than 0. Note, this value is available for English and Vickrey auction type only.
3. Reserve Price, if the final auction price is lower than this value, the auction will be cancelled. Leave it as 0 if you don't want to limit it.
4. Buy Now Price, a "buy now" price which allows buyers to bypass bidding altogether and purchase the item outright. Leave it as 0 if you don't allow direct order. Note, module doesn't allow "buy now" price for second item auction type.
5. Start Date, End Date, Auction Days, These values can't be changed after product creation.
6. Stock Quantity, for second item auction type, module doesn't allow stock quantity lower than 2. For other auction types, module will set this value as 1.

data.name: ErrorMessage_Stock.Text
data.value: For second item auction type, module doesn't allow stock quantity < 2, please change it.

data.name: li_AuctionResult_HasBidButReservePriceNotMet.Text
data.value: 2 - Expired and has bid, but reserve price not met

data.name: li_AuctionResult_PriceValidForBidderPurchase.Text
data.value: 3 - Has bid and reserve price met, waiting for bidder check out

data.name: li_AuctionResult_SoldOut.Text
data.value: 4 - Bidder paid, item was sold out

data.name: ErrorMessage_BidIncrement.Text
data.value: Minimum Bidding Increment must bigger than 0.

data.name: ErrorMessage_BuyNowPrice.Text
data.value: Buy now price should bigger than start price (if it is not equal to 0).

data.name: ErrorMessage_AuctionDays.Text
data.value: "Auction Days" can't bigger than {0} days, please change it.

data.name: ErrorMessage_DateDifferThan.Text
data.value: The interval between auction "Start Date/Time" and "End Date/Time" can't bigger than {0} days, please change it.

data.name: ErrorMessage_EndDateLower.Text
data.value: Auction "End Date/Time" can't sonner than "Start Date/Time", please change it.

data.name: ErrorMessage_WrongDateFormat_End.Text
data.value: Invalid date/time format for "End Date/Time", please check it.

data.name: ErrorMessage_WrongDateFormat_Start.Text
data.value: Invalid date/time format for "Start Date/Time", please check it.

data.name: Tip_AuctionDate.Text
data.value:
Click the date (and time) picker to specify the auction start/end date (time), these values can't be changed after product creation . Note:
1. If you specify "End Date/Time", module will ignore the "Auction Days" property.
2. If you leave "End Date/Time" as empty, module will take "Start Date/Time" + "Auction Days" as "End Date/Time".
3. Modify date/time value to specify minute. For example, change "10/20/2014 8:00 AM" to "10/20/2014 8:24 AM" to start at 8:24 AM.

data.name: lblUploadViaJs.Text
data.value: If above MS Silverlight upload control isn't available (for example, you are using iPhone/iPad/Android/tablet, or using Windows 10 edge browser which doesn't support Silverlight), try click "Upload Files Via JavaScript" button below. Note, you can also press Ctrl key to select multiple files once.
